articles.title: Mysterious dark matter ‘ghost’ particle may have finally been detected, ending decades-long search - RT
articles.description: In a breakthrough that could help unravel several of the most perplexing mysteries of the universe, scientists believe they have detected traces of a hypothetical dark matter particle.
articles.content: All the matter in the universe is made up of many different kinds of particles. The most common are protons, neutrons and electrons. However, a team of theoretical physicists believe they have uncove… [+1892 chars]

articles.title: NASA SLS test fire: Artemis 1 ‘mega rocket’ aborts Green Run hot fire - Daily Express
articles.description: NASA has ended a critical engine test early for a core stage of its cutting-edge rocket Space Launch System (SLS), the space agency has announced.

articles.author: Daniel Patrascu
articles.title: ISS Needs More Solar Panels, Boeing Jumps In to Help - autoevolution
articles.description: It was not that long ago that the fate of the International Space Station (ISS) hung in the balance, as its operators were scrambling to find funding to keep it running. In the short term, that problem has been solved, and the ISS is now looking to expand.

articles.title: International Space Station to be visible in skies above Glasgow next week - Glasgow Live

articles.author: Tom Fish
articles.title: Dinosaur discovery: Fossils found in Argentina may have belonged to largest land animal - Daily Express
articles.description: DINOSAUR fossils unearthed in South America may belong to the largest land animal that scientists have ever found - so far.
